name: Headlong Hunt (itch)
description:
Play the role of a field biologist as you survey the population of a fearful but very fast animal across 37 icy islands.

Any level can be chosen from the level select, however it is highly recommended to play them in order. 

The game contains optional flavour text snippets which aren't intended as hints to the puzzles.

Controls: 

  • Z is undo
  • R is restart
  • WASD or arrow keys for movement 

Here is a mobile friendly link: https://dario-zubovic.github.io/PuzzleScript/play.html?p=6df4e6ea8d2c69842f4caf382e9e2bd5
